title: Sona needs a Buff, there is no more Klpetomancy

embed.description: Karthus R - REQUIEM BUGFIX Champions in an untargetable state are now properly unaffected by R - Requiem's damage Qiyana Q - EDGE OF IXTAL STEALTH BUGFIX Qiyana is no longer locked out of auto-attacking after stealthing from a Grass-enchanted Q - Edge of Ixtal Kha'Zix Q - TASTE THEIR

body:
Right now Sona is the worst support of the whole game, sheâ€™s very slow, very squishy and useless. 
**come on!. bring  Sonas power up back before patch 9.13   :C , pls** and I'm not mentioning that Kleptomancy has just been removed...
